name: Edmund the Fishmonger
intro:
Jovial and talkative, uses humor to deflect. Friendly but occasionally too eager to please.

A portly fisherman who smells of the sea and always has a joke ready. He's honest most of the time but occasionally smuggles 'special catches' for wealthy clients. His friendliness can be disarming, but he talks too much when nervous.
tells_lying: keeps touching his fish cart nervously
appearance: Round-bellied man with a bushy red beard and weathered skin. He wears a stained apron and rubber boots, with a wide-brimmed hat to shield from the sun. His cart reeks of fish and seaweed.
